educations.school: Dhirubhai Ambani Institute of Information and Communication Technology (DA-IICT)
educations.degree: Master of Science (M.S) in Data Science
content: Courses: Data Structures & Alogorithms, Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Recommendation System, Big Data Processing, Information Retrieval, Corporate Finance, NLP, Generative AI
Courses: Digital System Design, Embedded Systems, VLSI Design, IoT, Machine Learning, Computer Networks, Image Processing

description: Spearheaded the work on multiple reports for 5 priority clients to provide additional functionalities.
Engineered a Reprogrammable Bias Generation system using MSP430FR5969 and LabVIEW, achieving 6 PWM signals with a single microcontroller.​
Optimized microcontroller pin usage, reducing spacecraft circuit space and saving nearly Rs 15k.
Collaborated with senior scientists, earned a recommendation for innovative problem-solving and work in a fast-paced challenging environment.
Developed a web app for mission planning, control and execution using Vue & Flask, thereby improving onside project performance by 22%.​
Designed an icon set for various functionalities using ​Illustrator​, which improved usability by 20%.
